overview: Legendary Adult Star and AVN MILF of the Year 2011 Julia Ann steps into the role of The Stepmother in Sweet Sinner's popular family-themed series. Young hottie (AVN's Best New Starlet 2011) Gracie Glam fears her trusting dad (Tommy Gunn) is blind to the manipulations of his gorgeous new wife Julia Ann. When Gracie brings her fiancee (James Deen) home for the weekend, Julia sets her sights on the young stud while Gracie soon learns a terrible secret about Julia's sordid past. Can Gracie spill the beans on her scheming Stepmother without spilling her own dark secrets?
tagline: She was the perfect trophy wife...until her past came back to haunt her.
title: The Stepmother 4: Her Secret Past
